#include<stdio.h>
#define get getchar_unlocked 
 
inline int scan()
{
    int n=0,s=1;
    char p=get();
    if(p=='-')  s=-1;
    while((p<'0'||p>'9')&&p!=EOF&&p!='-') p=get();
    if(p=='-') s=-1,p=get();
    while(p>='0'&&p<='9') { n = (n<< 3) + (n<< 1) + (p - '0'); p=get(); }
    return n*s;
}

int main()
{
long long ans,t,c,p,n;
t=scan();
while(t--)
{
//scanf("%lld %lld",&p,&c);
p=scan();c=scan();
ans=p/(c+1);
if(p%(c+1)!=0)
ans++;
printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
